page.title: 04FOSSE KENNELS, nr OFFCHURCH.
page.content: { The Fosse Boarding Kennels}for dogs lie half a mile off the Fosse Way. The kennels are reached by means of a track, suitable for a Saloon type car, truck or Range Rover. The kennels are run by a husband and wife team only. {Forty four dogs}can be housed at any one time, in double or single kennels. In the main, the dogs are cared for while their owners are on holiday or working overseas. { Any dog becoming ill}is placed immediately in an isolation kennel and the local Veterinary surgeon contacted for diagnosis and treatment of the illness. Dog owners are asked to agree to this procedure before they leave their pets at the kennels. {The boarding kennels are open ten {months of the year, closing all June {and October.
